评论概述: Very nice suit, hard to choose a size
评论详情: I ordered this suit for my son to wear to his senior prom. I went with an XL based on reviews. The suit was a nearly perfect fit, however, there is no stretch or give to the fabric. So while it looked great and he was comfortable standing still, I didn't trust it to hold up to moving around and dancing. I returned it and ordered a 2XL and am keeping my fingers crossed. One of the best things about it are the longer pants length, he is a 34-36inch inseam, and finding pants that don't sit high on the ankle is sometimes a challenge. He is 6'1" and a very muscular 200lbs, about a 34" waist and a 45" chest.
Great suit with great quality, we ordered 3 other suits and this was the best. Tie didnt match, but didnt need.

Just for clarification for some of you, I am 6’2” and currently 240 lbs.  I ordered a 3x thinking it sounds huge.  I’m tall and thin except for my growing dad bod belly!  The 3x pants fit perfect.  The coat and vest weren’t even close.  They were very small on me.  I had to return and the company refunded me instantly.  They were very nice about it so I thought I’d leave this here.I doubt the 4x would have fit me so I decided not to try.Piecing together a nice fitting suit at my local mall, I am 50L jacket, 18.5 shirt, 40 pant is very comfortable. 38 fits. But 40 is generous!  I hope this helps someone looking for a suit.All in all the suit wasn’t bad.  It was thin. Make a good summer time or warm climate suit.  But I’m in the northeast kingdom so the cold is a factor as well.

评论概述: I found the sizing to be all wrong
评论详情: The suit was very nice. I thought that I had ordered correctly, but obviously not so. I am a regular sized man not a SLIM man. When ordering suits it is important to order the pants separate from the vest and coat. My previous suits are Van Heusen and that is how I ordered those. The pants fit nicely since there was expansive material in the waist. The suit coat and vest were too small across the chest; at least 6 to 8 inches too short. The material for the suit was nice. Had read in reviews that others have had trouble with the sizing also.

评论概述: Can't beat the value for the price!
评论详情: This three piece suit is an excellent bargain for its price, even including a fairly decent tie! The fabric was uniform across the entirety of the suit, with even colors throughout; which speaking if the color, this dark green did not fail to impress. The liner on the jacket was very comfortable and was moderately breathable. I really like how the shoulders of the jacket contoured on me, and I thought the pants stretch waistband was a nice touch. The only shortcoming I could see with this set would be the vest, backing on it did not feel all too great, but again, for the price it's a world of a difference to what I expected. I am very happy with this suit and will soon get it tailored!
